swamp.description: Flat land, water flooded, with dense vegetation. Watch your steps.

dry.description: Dry season in the Swamp lasts six months. There is almost no rain at all. It is warm during the day, but cool at night.

wet.description: Wet season in the Swamp lasts six months. This is the warm period. Afternoon showers are common, and the bush is lush.

enable_egg_spot.description: Calls a goblin to lay an egg

music.description: Will call someone to play this instrument
music.disabled_description: Waiting for someone to play it, or in use already.

charge.description: Uses 3 firefly jewels to charge it
charge.disabled_description: Waiting the 3 jewels to be delivered

use.disabled_description: Waiting someone to come and use it

bulletin_message.00: Your clan has proven gracious, and your gardens savory. Many of my kin mistrust the progeny of Snake, but I feel we must extend a paw of friendship.

Some orcs somehow found an entrance to our hovel and are asking for... a bunch of wooden doors? We have neither wood nor carpenter on paw, so could you perhaps craft some for us?

Alternatively, we're not afraid to fight them off, but we lack the means to heal our injured afterwards.

"Thank you, I'm sure those big orcs will find these quite satisfactory. May our friendship ever blossom!." He offers you glittering bags as payment.

[Rabbit reputation increased]
"I understand. I haven't heard any howling in a while, I think your goblin odors might have thrown them off. I'll make a break for it, the long way around..."

"Greetings, kind goblins. As you know, we live undergound, and because of that we rely on Amberstone, our namesake material, for many things."

"Amberstones can absorb many kinds of energy, sunlight being one of them - and these stones here have lost their glow."
"I understand. Perhaps next time. Farewell, goblins."

"Dear goblins, some of my clan respect the efficiency of your Trappers. Could one visit for two days, so that we might learn their methods and adapt them for our own use?"

"We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"We have need of someone experienced with wood for two days, to help with bracing a tunnel and putting up new vegetable storage.""

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"We have need of someone experienced with hard materials for two days, to help us with forging some new digging equipment."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"Our medics would like to compare notes with one of your Shamans for a couple of days."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

borrow_quest_bonesmith.title: Send a Bonesmith
borrow_quest_bonesmith.text: Select a Bonesmith (Level 3+) to help Clan Amberstone.

borrow_quest_earthmaster.title: Send an Earthmaster
borrow_quest_earthmaster.text: Select an Earthmaster (Level 3+) to help Clan Amberstone.

borrow_quest_shaman.title: Send a Shaman
borrow_quest_shaman.text: Select a Shaman (Level 3+) to help Clan Amberstone.

bulletin_message.00: Sasha Lightfoot approaches, a small load-bearing stone insect bobbling along behind him. "Friends! Not long ago, my kind were afraid of you kin of Snake, but you have dissolved our purposeless trepidation! We have found in you a dependable ally in the aboveground!"

"My dear goblin friends! It has been generations since we Lapine have found an ally as trustworthy as you. We have decided to offer you a precious gift."

"We would like to bring one of your own into our warren for a time, to teach them the art of Geomancy."

"Do you understand how vital Geomancy is to us, of the history of my kind and of Clan Amberstone?"

Sasha nods sagely. "This world of Hearth is ruled by the Heavenly Cycles. Each eon brings a different entity to Ascendance, who raises their own kind to an evolved state."

"Monkey is in Ascendance now, giving Humans form and cleverness. Snake was before. Rabbit before that; long ago, but you can find our statues dotting the landscape even now."
"Splendid! I think even a novice Bonesmith and Earthmaster would work just fine, so long as they're receptive to teaching. It shouldn't take more than two days."
"Hum. Well, I suppose maybe I still have much to learn about goblin aesthetics after all..."

"Kind greetings, goblin friends! I was struck by an idea after watching your crafters at work - how would you like to send a Bonesmith and an Earthmaster down to our warren for a few days, to learn our various crafting recipes and techniques?"

40_recipe_sharing_quest.text: Select a Bonesmith and Earthmaster (Levels 1+) to go learn Amberstone recipes

bulletin_message.00:
Your venturing Bonesmith and Earthmaster have returned, with knowledge of all sorts of Rabbit recipes!

"I must say, your citizens shared tales of mushroom recipes with us. I simply must try it sometime..."

"Dear friends of the Snake, I bring greetings and well wishes from the twenty-third warren of Amberstone."

"I have a‚Ä¶ momentous favor to ask of you, but I think perhaps you lack the context to understand it. Am I right that the human history of the Phoenix Empire became lost after the cataclysm?"

"Humans, sensible, fled; to the coasts, to the northern mountains. Only recently have they started to build inwards again. Orcs, stubborn, stayed and fought the corruptions, fought the apparitions of a natural world brought to anger, defending the lands abandoned by the humans. And we Lapine, already underground, were content to wait."

"But as the evil energies settled, they embedded in the ground, drawn downwards towards the source of Hearth‚Äôs magic. These fragments absorb that magic, slowly gaining strength over generations, congealing into malevolent aspects which we have come to call ‚ÄòTitans‚Äô."

"First, I will need to borrow some of your citizens: One experienced Earthmaster to double-check our work and help with reinforcement, plus three other citizens of your choosing to... help reach the tall parts."

"With that complete, we will return with the weapon, and once you have prepared, we will use it to summon, attack, and destroy the Titan. The attack may take some significant time, so you should prepare for a siege."

"I should say... this evil is of no immediate threat to you. This is a task to benefit your people's children, and mine."

50_titan_weapon_quest.text: Choose an Earthmaster (Lv4), plus any three other citizens to help Clan Amberstone

bulletin_message.00:
"Hello again, my friends of the Snake! I hope this day finds you at peace.

Honorable Goblins, I... have a confession to make."

firefly_shop_1.name: Firefly Simple Items Shop
firefly_shop_1.title: A firefly goblin has arrived with items from his hometown

firefly_shop_2.name: Firefly Items Shop
firefly_shop_2.title: A small firefly goblin group has arrived with items from their hometown

firefly_shop_3.name: Firefly Complete Items Shop
firefly_shop_3.title: A very organized firefly goblin caravan has arrived with items from their hometown

before_chosing_banner.title: It is time
before_chosing_banner.message:
No need to wait any longer, the shaman is ready, and we are all set.
Let's pick our banner.

explain_egg.title: Daily Report?
explain_egg.message:
What is a 'Daily Report'? A way to get new citizens? We don't have such a thing.
Use the Goblinpedia, crafted by the Shaman, to learn how it is done.

explain_egg_again.title: Goblin eggs!
explain_egg_again.message:
We are going to repeat this, just to make sure you know about it, ok?
To get new goblins, you need to first place and use the egg pedestal.

More information available on the goblinpedia.

first_contact.title: First Impression
first_contact.message:
No, that's not possible...
You guys are here too?
first_contact.message_2:
Good try, but it will not work.
We know your tactics.
This time, we will take the initiative first!

footman_death_dialog.title: Not bad
footman_death_dialog.message:
Next attack wave will be harder.
Let's see if you can handle that tomorrow.

unreachable_attack.title: Cowards!
unreachable_attack.message: We can't reach you! We will increase our forces anyway, and we will get you once you are reachable!

boss_death_dialog.title: Victory
boss_death_dialog.message:
Oh man, I can't believe we were defeated.
Why did you do this?
boss_death_dialog.message2: Of course we attacked you, you would have attacked us anyway.
boss_death_dialog.message3:
We didn't have to fight? Nice!
I'm Nina, sorry for the trouble.
So... Who are you guys?

nina_introduction.title: Introductions
nina_introduction.message:
Interesting. And similar to our group.
We are exploring new and far lands, to better understand our world, and map it for new settlements when needed.
nina_introduction.message2:
We will stay around, if you need help with something just ask
Oh, and we have some food for you, as payback for our trouble

The food will be dropped at your banner

peaceful_introduction.title: Introductions
peaceful_introduction.message:
Hi, I'm Nina, we have just settled here, I hope we can grow together peacefully in this area.
We are exploring new and far lands, to better understand our world, and map it for new settlements when needed.
peaceful_introduction.message2:
We will stay around, if you need help with something just ask
Oh, and we have some food for you, consider it a neighborly gift

The food will be dropped at your banner

humans_asks_materials.title: A helping hand
humans_asks_materials.message:
We are in the middle of a project here, but we have run out of resources to complete it...
Could you help us with a few materials?
humans_asks_materials.nope: Oh, that is ok. We will try alone, but it will take longer to finish...
humans_asks_materials.yep:
Nice!
It is not much, as you can see, just a few things in our item list.

materials_abandon_quest.title: A helping hand
materials_abandon_quest.message:
Oh no. We were counting with those materials...
Don't worry. We will change a few things here, maybe it ends up just with a longer delay.

materials_done.title: Quest Completed
materials_done.message:
Thanks, this will help us a lot!
Here, we have prepared some food as a thank you gift.

The food will be dropped at your banner

notice_human_hearth.title: Step up
notice_human_hearth.message:
Our friends over there already got their shiny new hearth!
Maybe we should start thinking about our hearth upgrade too.
notice_human_hearth.message_2:
We decided on two options to represent our town:
Warrior Hearth and Nature Hearth
notice_human_hearth.message_3:
The Warrior Hearth is for those who believe their destiny is to stand strong in a hostile world.
We will be able to fight against the best warriors from other clans, training with them and learning from them.
notice_human_hearth.message_4:
The Nature Hearth is for those who believe that a town's value is found within its happy citizens in harmony with nature.
We will receive random daily blessings.
notice_human_hearth.message_5: Warrior or Nature? What do you think would be the most fitting for out town from here and beyond?

warrior.name: Warrior Hearth
warrior.description:
Proof that you have military strength, and that you're prepared to keep it on its feet.
  • Allows summoning increasingly difficult challengers to improve your skills

nature.name: Nature Hearth
nature.description:
Proof that you have happy citizens in sync with nature, and nice places for them to live.
  • Each day brings a new random buff for your townsfolk.

toys.description: This is what happens when goblins are asked to bring their own stuff
toys.tooltip: Hands full of weapons, bellies full of food, and pockets full of money.

nature.description: Balancing yourself with nature can be hard sometimes, this should help.
nature.tooltip: Basic materials from the start, should you need them all.

swamp_home.tooltip: I love living in the swamp.

not_swamp_home.tooltip: I would rather be in the swamp.

sticky_water.tooltip: Eww! I hate going in this muddy water.

warrior_hearth.bulletin_default: You have challengers ready to fight
warrior_hearth.just_workers: Some workers want to test their strength in the arena
warrior_hearth.easy_goblins: A group of fighters is up to the challenge
warrior_hearth.easy_goblins_2: A party of goblin fighters wants to test their powers
warrior_hearth.boss_at_5: ‚öîÔ∏è We, The Golden Conquering Arm, have come to challenge you and claim the glory from defeating you, fellow warriors
warrior_hearth.easy_hearthlings: Humans soldiers from a nearby camp are saying they are stronger than us
warrior_hearth.easy_hearthlings_2: A well organized human group wants some glory
warrior_hearth.boss_at_10: ‚öîÔ∏è We, The Golden Conquering Arm, have returned, this time with reinforcements, to test our skills one more time
warrior_hearth.boss_at_15: ‚öîÔ∏è The Protectors, the famous party of paladins, send their best apprentices to test their skills

firefly_clan.long_description: Living in the swamp as a shamanistic tribe setup. This way of living has given them a perception on life, that are a bit different than their greenskinned cousins.

firefly_chaser.description: At night, [name(i18n_data.entity)] will wander around looking for fireflies to admire.

frog_companion.description: Ever since [name(i18n_data.savior)] [str(i18n_data.maybe_determiner)] [str(i18n_data.maybe_savior_species)] saved their [str(i18n_data.savee_species)], [name(i18n_data.savee)], from mortal danger, they've been inseparable.

firefly_confusion.description: A firefly cloud blinds and confuses the enemy

goblin_aura.description: Protection granted by the Spirit Walker

full_leather_helmet.description: More protection than other leather helmet

clay_water_well.description: An ingenious mechanism for retrieving underground water.

wooden_water_well.description: An ingenious mechanism for retrieving underground water.

curtains_door.description: A larger door. It makes quite an impression.

awning.description: For those who don't like sun in their eyes.

big_firefly_essense.description: Has the equivalent of 8 small firefly essence bottles. Glow in the dark
big_firefly_essense.flavor: Can be harvested back to 8 bottles later

certificate.flavor: Could be from a promotion, or from winning a spit competition, anything is valid

fiber_rug.description: A blend of fibers are woven tightly by hand, for whatever foot traffic comes its way.

hourglass.description: A funny shaped glass with sand inside, draining from one end to the other
hourglass.flavor: It is not my turn to flip it!

nature_hearth.description: Provides warmth, light, comfort, and random daily buffs

warrior_hearth.description: Provides warmth, light, comfort, and combat training sessions

goblin_large_totem.description: Commemorative totem, resembling someone from the clan
goblin_large_totem.flavor: Don't worry, it is not made from real skulls, just white paint

goblin_small_totem.description: Commemorative totem, resembling someone from the clan
goblin_small_totem.flavor: Don't worry, it is not made from real skulls, just white paint

mini_fountain.description: Water starts at the top and flow down going through all pieces
mini_fountain.flavor: 4 of these can be placed together to create a larger fountain

pole_banner.description: A banner with the clan colors, raised high so everyone can see it
pole_banner.flavor: Military units will consider this on their patrol path

potted_cattail.description: Natural from the swamp biome, now for your home
potted_cattail.flavor: Hey, can you water my plants while I'm away?

potted_giple.description: Natural from the swamp biome, now for your home
potted_giple.flavor: Hey, can you water my plants while I'm away?

potted_sapling.description: Natural from the swamp biome, now for your home
potted_sapling.flavor: Hey, can you water my plants while I'm away?

windchime.flavor: A different melody plays as the wind changes

window_box_wood.description: A tidy home for the plant.

goblin.description: A sign with a goblin face

varanus.description: A sign with a varanus face

fake_vegetables.description: Goblins are not too fond of vegetables, so Shamans had to get creative to keep a healthy diet.
fake_vegetables.flavor: This food item counts as vegetable for all other recipes

plate_of_mushrooms.flavor: Uses ingredients found in the Swamp Biome

table.flavor: No, you already played with the green pieces last time, it is my turn now

chair.description: You can sit on it. Very soft.

table.description: A table, for table things. A little wobbly.

throne.description: Large and fancy chair for special goblins
throne.flavor: Watchout, no one wants to be left out, everyone is special

hammock.description: To sleep far from the ground

swing.flavor: Is this broken? Why the swing does not move?

wood_throne.description: Large and fancy chair for special goblins
wood_throne.flavor: Watchout, no one wants to be left out, everyone is special

baby.description: It will turn into a grown up soon

camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home

goblin_camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home
goblin_camp_standard.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will grow strong through our muscles and spirit.
  • Mining gives 50% more Ore, Stone, and Clay
  • Goblins no longer mind cramped spaces

varanus_camp_standard.description: How you know you've come home
varanus_camp_standard.town_bonus_description:
This settlement shall be at one with the environment.
  • Trees produce 25% more Wood
  • Plants and Crops both grow 25% faster
  • Plants have 2x their normal Appeal

goblinpedia.flavor: Use this item to open an actual encyclopedia with all the necessary information about the Firefly Clan and the Swamp Biome. Can also be used as just a nice decoration

firefly_nest.description: Summons a firefly nest in a raised garden

giant_mushroom.description: Summons a giant mushroom, mineable and edible

king_stone.description: Summons a big rock with a stair formation to the top

minerals.description: Summons big rocks spread in a large area

mushroom_stone.description: Summons a raised piece of rock with some mushrooms on top

varanus_nest.description: Summons a cave entrance with a varanus nest inside

waterfall.description: Summons a big rock formation with a waterfall

weather_stone.flavor: After placed, it needs to be charged with jewels before being activated.

bear.description: Big and fast, a little muddy, yet fluffy

bongo.description: A percussion instrument consisting of a pair of small drums of different sizes.
bongo.flavor: Click on it and press the play button, someone will come to play it

xylophone.description: A musical instrument in the percussion family that consists of wooden bars struck by mallets.
xylophone.flavor: Click on it and press the play button, someone will come to play it

cattail.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread.
cattail.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: The small seeds of a big plant

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

giant_flower.description: Can be harvested for healing herbs
giant_flower.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: The small seeds of a giant flower

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

mushroom.description: Harvestable for a meager food supply.
mushroom.unripe_description: This mushroom has been harvested and has not grown back yet

mushroom_garden.unripe_description: The mushroom in this garden has not fully grown yet

lilypad.description: Floats and can hold up a lot of weight

jewel.flavor: Has the magical properties of the essences and minerals used to craft them.

giant_flower.description: An herb commonly used for medicinal purposes

big_g.description: Beloved and playful, helped his generation through tough times

big_wolf.description: Playful with allies, a beast for the enemies.

poyo.description: Elite Poyo summoned to help in the fight

seed.description: Plantable to grow a bogger tree
Plantable to grow a cypress tree

magma_sword.flavor: Must be skilled enough to make such a weapon. And skilled enough to use it.

skull_basher.description: Try to aim it at enemies head

beast_tamer_description.description: Summon and controls animals in battle

level_1_data.perk_000_description: A group of elite Poyos called the Four Feathers will join and help in the fight

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Summons local fauna wildlife to help in the battle

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Immobilize enemies using traps, the amount based on this goblin mind stat

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons a pair of varanus into the fight

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Casts a cloud of fireflies into enemies, confusing and blinding them

level_6_data.perk_000_description:
(Goblins only)
With the combined power of a (max level) Spirit Walker, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle
level_6_data.perk_001_description:
(Hearthlings only)
Summons a big wolf, one that inspires your allies and scares the enemies.

bonesmith_description.description: Crafts basic items with materials like wood and fiber

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Bonesmith may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Bonesmith can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

bonesmith_workbench.description: Only simple tasks should be done here

weaving_table.description: A place to weave armors, even the hard solid ones

earthmaster_description.description: Craft advance items and decorations using hard materials like stone and clay

level_1_data.perk_000_description: From the advanced materials, stone is the most basic one. Still, quite a leap compared to the usual wood and fiber stuff.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Crafting with clay is always interesting, such a soft material when modelled and heated end almost as solid as stone.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Earthmaster may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.
level_3_data.perk_001_description: What about rocks and metals as soft as clay? Liquid fire as some call it.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Earthmaster can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

wood.description: Break the object back into a wood piece

stone.description: Break the object back into a stone piece

clay.description: Break the object back into a clay piece

raw_stone.description: A mix of clay and chitin powder heated up to rock hard

shaman_description.description: Takes care of the clan well-being and growth

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Shaman may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Shaman can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

shaman_workbench.description: Shamans will use to craft their stuff

shaman_firefly_token.description: Shamans will use this to extract firefly essences

dreamcatcher_talisman.description: Helps with magic. Don't let your dreams be dreams.

egg_pedestal.description: Used to lay eggs and take care of it

spirit_walker_description.description: Healer, summons spirits to help in fights

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Can heal in small amounts the health of allies

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Summons a goblin spirit that will help in fights

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Summons multiple goblin spirits, the amount based on this goblin spirit stat

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons the beloved and playful goblin Big G. He helped his generation through tough times ages ago.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: All your Warriors will now be shielded by a defensive aura

level_6_data.perk_000_description: With the combined power of a (max level) Beast Tamer, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle

spirit_walker_staff_talisman.flavor: Promotes a goblin to Spirit Walker

warrior_description.description: Pride in fighting. Warriors are the ones to use heavy weapons and wear armor.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The basics are learned, gaining courage and increasing stamina

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Performs a Spin Attack that hits everyone around.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Hits enemies far away with darts, poisoning them.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Tougher skin for a faster health regeneration.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Strength aquired from past fights grants +1 Body stat

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Stats gets higher the longer a fight lasts.

worker_description.description:
Workers perform basic tasks like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around, and constructing buildings.

‚öîÔ∏è Goblin workers can also fight and be in a combat party.

data.raid_egg: Watch out! Some bugs are after our eggs!

cover.title: About goblins and swamps
cover.text: * Pick the desired topic to read from the side menu

pedestal.title: Egg Pedestal
pedestal.description1: A nice cerimonial table for an important ocasion

topic1.title: Crafting:
topic1.desc1: The egg pedestal is crafted by the shaman of your clan

topic2.title: How to use:
topic2.desc1: After placing it, click on it. In the bottom left you will see its buttons. Click on the egg icon.
topic2.desc2: One of your goblins (worker only) will come to this pedestal and lay an egg.

egg.title: Goblin Egg
egg.description1: Who came first, the egg or the goblin?
egg.description2: Many goblins wondered about it for as long as they remember, but no one knows for sure.
egg.description3: The goblins current most acceptable hypotesys is that it was neither. It was a tie.

topic1.title: How to get:
topic1.desc1: An egg pedestal is needed first, for a goblin to lay his egg.

topic2.title: Hatching:
topic2.desc1: After one day, the egg will hatch into a baby goblin.

topic3.title: Protecting:
topic3.desc1: Watch out, the egg attracts wild animals.

topic1.title: Behaviour:
topic1.desc1: Eat, sleep, ask for attention, repeat.

topic2.title: Raising:
topic2.desc1: Just feed it, a lot. Babies eat 5 times more than adults, so watch your stocks!

topic3.title: Grow:
topic3.desc1: One more day and they grow into adult goblins.

topic1.title: Firefly Clan:
topic1.desc1: Now a fully member of society.

topic2.title: Jobs:
topic2.desc1: Can be promoted to Warrior, Shaman, Spirit Walker, Trapper, Beast Tamer, Bonesmith and Earthmaster.
topic2.desc2: (With mods, some other jobs may be possible too)

topic3.title: The good guys:
topic3.desc1: Different from the green goblins, often associated with trouble, these ones are way more behaved and rooted.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Fighter class, promoted from a Trapper. Can summon animals to fight, from little poyos to giant dragons.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Aside from summoning animals, they can trap enemies and cast a firefly cloud, blinding and confusing them.
topic2.desc2: With the help of a Spirit Walker, they join forces and can summon an ancient dragon spirit.

topic3.title: Hearthling variation:
topic3.desc1: Hearthlings can be promoted to it too. Though the Spirit Walker teamwork to summon a dragon is now a solo effort to summon a Big Wolf.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Basic crafter class. From equipments to furniture and decorations.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Uses low level materials like wood and fibers to craft simple items.
topic2.desc2: Starter houses uses mostly furniture and decoration from this class. Can also equip warriors with most of their weapons and armors.

topic3.title: Promotion:
topic3.desc1: Bonesmith can later be promoted into Earthmaster, an advanced highlevel crafter class.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Advanced crafter class. From equipments to furniture and decorations.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Uses high level materials like stone and clay to craft furniture and decorations.
topic2.desc2: Can upgrade other classes tools and workbenches, and do some simple metal refining, like crafting firefly jewels, a high level crafting resource

topic3.title: Beyond crafting:
topic3.desc1: Earthmaster can recycle items made from wood, stone and clay, or burn wood items to make coal
topic3.desc2: The class can also repair most items, like door, turrets and other breakable gizmos

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Starter crafter class. Central figure for the clan well-being and growth.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Harvest firefly essence used to imbue items in magic, some cooking and herbalism.
topic2.desc2: Crafts all the clan talismans. Can also craft the egg pedestal, an important item for the clan growth.

topic3.title: Promotion:
topic3.desc1: Shamans can later be promoted into Spirit Walkers, a summoner/healer class.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Healer class, promoted from a Shaman. Can summon spirits to fight.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Aside from summoning spirits, they can heal some health of near allies by small amounts.

topic3.title: Class synergies:
topic3.desc1: Can cast a protective aura to all warriors, increasing their defenses
topic3.desc2: With the help of a Beast Tamer, they join forces and can summon an ancient dragon spirit.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Main fighter class. The muscles of the party.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Close range fighter, have access to many goblin equipments, increasing their attack and defense.

topic3.title: Skills:
topic3.desc1: Can learn new abilities as they progress.
topic3.desc2: Can hit multiple enemies at once, use ranged poison darts, and even gets stronger stats.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Flying insects that glows at night. Loved by the goblins.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Usually group in big clouds glowing at night under the trees

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Can't be interacted directly, but shamans can extract magic powers from them, hence their clan name. Some goblins have a trait called Firefly Chaser, those goblins will walk into firefly clouds to admire them

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Ambient small critters that can be found near the water.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Spend their time jumping from one lilypad to another, hunting small insects. Very noisy at night.

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Trappers can get them for food or even as pets, baby goblins love them.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Large reptiles with a hard skin, loves water.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Usually hostile to those that get too close. Can be found near their nests at caves entrances.

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: When in the wild they are hostile, but a beast tamer can summon tamed varanus to fight with them.
